notesStmt.note: The "second blast" is a translation of book 6 of "De gubernatione Dei" by Salvian of Marseilles; the third is sometimes attributed to Anthony Munday (i.e. Anglo-phile Eutheo?).
The "first blast" was "The schoole of abuse" by Stephen Gosson.
Printer's name and address from colophon.
Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: A-I.
